content: WHAT CRASH? ¬†WHAT CORRECTION??!? WHAT BEAR MARKET??   ¬†¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† Yes...I am still in a good mood so giving out a Bitcoin convention 2023 bag!! ¬† ¬† KEEP ON HODLING FELLAS!!! ¬† ¬†¬†¬† Thanks for MinerJones donation!¬†Free shipping in the USA, if overseas I can ship to MinerJones and you pay him for handling and reshippingOnly one spot per person.No NEWBIES registered anytime after 1st FebruaryONLY ONE RULE>> PICK A ¬†NUMBER NO RANDOMS PLEASE..sorry randoms will be ignored¬†¬†¬† I also suggest using ¬†privnote.com to send me your addy via PM once raffle winner wants to get in touch with me.Its for your privacy. ¬† ¬†You have to reach out to me when winning. If items are stolen or does not arrive because of thievery in the postal system I am not sending a new one.Read all of this and then decide if you want in or not. I am not responsible for any failed deliveries.¬†I am sending out of the goodness of my heart and that's it. ¬† This applied to all auctions in the past and future ones as well as the thread says.
